sentences.english: Two cases of cholera, one of which has ended fatally, have occurred here.
sentences.chinese: 這裏發生過兩起霍亂病例，其中一人已經死亡。

sentences.english: The cases have been laboratory confirmed by the Institut Pasteur, Dakar.
sentences.chinese: 這些病例已得到達喀爾巴斯德研究所的實驗室確認。

sentences.english: No cases have been reported outside Uige for the past five weeks.
sentences.chinese: 在過去5周內在威熱省之外未報告發生病例。

sentences.english: China has reported 1, 537 cases of swine flu with no fatalities to date.
sentences.chinese: 中國迄今共報告了1537例甲流，沒有死亡病例。

sentences.english: Vietnam also has reported recent cases of blue ear decease ( disease ).
sentences.chinese: 越南也報告說最近發現藍耳豬的病例。

sentences.english: Most cases detected in other provinces have been linked directly to the outbreak in Uige.
sentences.chinese: 在其它省發現的大多數病例與威熱的暴發直接有關。

sentences.english: For fatal cases, the course of illness takes an average of two days.
sentences.chinese: 就死亡病例而言，病程平均兩天。

sentences.english: Signs include exercise intolerance, but often there is only a heart murmur.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀症狀包括運動不耐，但大多數病例僅有心臟雜音。

sentences.english: The domestic report botulism causes to breathe the myoparalysis case of illness to be less.
sentences.chinese: 國內報道肉毒中毒導致呼吸肌麻痹的病例較少。

sentences.english: As of today, nearly 30,000 confirmed cases have been reported in 74 countries.
sentences.chinese: 截至今天，在74個國家已報告了近3萬起確診病例。

sentences.english: Patients with hypoproteinemia or prolonged prothrombin time(PT) were often accompanied by hypocalcemia.
sentences.chinese: 低蛋白血癥和PT延長的病例伴有低血鈣較常見。

sentences.english: For example, many medical workers are convinced that the number of emergency cases increases during a full moon.
sentences.chinese: 例如，許多醫務工作者相信月圓時急診病例會增多。

sentences.english: Anticoagulants are effective in selected cases of disseminated intravascular coagulation.
sentences.chinese: 抗凝劑對於某些瀰漫性血管內凝血的病例還是有效的。

sentences.english: Mexico has reported 397 confirmed human cases of infection, including 16 deaths.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥報告397名確診病例，包括16名死亡病例。

sentences.english: Mexico has reported 397 confirmed human cases of infection, including 16 deaths.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥報告397名確診病例，包括16名死亡病例。

sentences.english: Samples from the other three suspected fatal cases could not be obtained .
sentences.chinese: 無法從其他三名疑似致死病例身上獲得樣本。

definition: to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
